name: The One Room Dungeon
description:
==============================

It's the tiniest excuse for a dungeon ever, but that doesn't mean that there's no danger lurking about... Navigate your way through the labyrinth full of monsters, and try not to die, go insane, or lose hope!

==============================

Do note that this game is designed for phones in mind. You can play it on any mobile device that has a touchscreen and an internet connection.

This game was made in under 12 hours as a Ludum Dare 37 compo entry. More mechanics MAY be added in the future.

==============================
